Container.Name: OpenClaw
Container.Overview: OpenClaw (formerly ClawdBot/MoltBot) is a powerful AI assistant gateway that connects Claude and other LLMs to messaging platforms like Discord, Telegram, WhatsApp, and more. Features include file access, shell commands, web browsing, cron jobs, and a web-based Control UI. IMPORTANT: To access the Control UI, add your token to the URL: http://YOUR-IP:18789/?token=YOUR-GATEWAY-TOKEN
Container.PostArgs: sh -c "mkdir -p /root/.openclaw; echo '{\"gateway\":{\"mode\":\"local\",\"bind\":\"lan\",\"controlUi\":{\"allowInsecureAuth\":true},\"auth\":{\"mode\":\"token\"}}}' > /root/.openclaw/openclaw.json; node dist/index.js gateway --bind lan"
Container.Description: OpenClaw (formerly ClawdBot/MoltBot) is a powerful AI assistant gateway that connects Claude and other LLMs to messaging platforms like Discord, Telegram, WhatsApp, and more. Features include file access, shell commands, web browsing, cron jobs, and a web-based Control UI. To access the Control UI, add your token to the URL: http://YOUR-IP:18789/?token=YOUR-GATEWAY-TOKEN

Config.Name: Control UI Port
Config.Description: Port for Control UI and Gateway API

Config.Name: Config Path
Config.Description: Path to store OpenClaw configuration files

Config.Name: Workspace Path
Config.Description: Path for agent workspace (files, memory, projects)

Config.Name: Gateway Token
Config.Description: Secret token for authentication. Recommend generating with: openssl rand -hex 24 (but can be any value). To access the Control UI, append this token to the URL: http://IP:18789/?token=YOUR_TOKEN_HERE

Config.Name: Anthropic API Key
Config.Description: API key for Claude models. Get from console.anthropic.com. Recommended for best experience.

Config.Name: OpenAI API Key
Config.Description: API key for GPT models. Get from platform.openai.com

Config.Name: OpenRouter API Key
Config.Description: API key for OpenRouter - access to Claude, GPT, Llama, and 100+ models. Get from openrouter.ai

Config.Name: Gemini API Key
Config.Description: API key for Google Gemini models. Get from aistudio.google.com

Config.Name: Groq API Key
Config.Description: API key for Groq (fast Llama/Mixtral inference). Get from console.groq.com

Config.Name: Discord Bot Token
Config.Description: (Optional) Discord bot token for Discord integration. Can also configure via Control UI after install.

Config.Name: Telegram Bot Token
Config.Description: (Optional) Telegram bot token from @BotFather. Can also configure via Control UI after install.

Config.Name: Gateway Port
Config.Description: Port for the gateway API and Control UI. Change if 18789 is already in use.

Config.Name: Web Search API Key
Config.Description: (Optional) Brave Search API key for web search capability. Get free tier at brave.com/search/api (2000 queries/month)
